languages.text: "Мон-кай не ценят жизни собратьев и потому способны жертвовать сотнями и тысячами в одном бою. На этом построено их военное искусство... если его можно так назвать".

"Mon-keigh do not value the lives of their fellow humans, and are therefore capable of sacrificing hundreds and thousands in a single battle. This is what their art of war — if you can call it that — is built upon."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай не ценят жизни собратьев и потому способны жертвовать сотнями и тысячами в одном бою. На этом построено их военное искусство... если его можно так назвать".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “猴子毫不珍视他们同胞的性命，因此一场战斗就可以牺牲成百上千的生命。这就是他们战争艺术的基础，如果你愿意把它叫做‘战争艺术’的话。”
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh do not value the lives of their fellow humans, and are therefore capable of sacrificing hundreds and thousands in a single battle. This is what their art of war — if you can call it that — is built upon."

traits.locale_text: “猴子毫不珍视他们同胞的性命，因此一场战斗就可以牺牲成百上千的生命。这就是他们战争艺术的基础，如果你愿意把它叫做‘战争艺术’的话。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les mon-keigh n'accordent aucune importance à la vie de leurs semblables et sont donc capables de sacrifier des milliers des leurs au cours d'une seule bataille. C'est sur cela que se base leur art de la guerre... si on peut appeler cela ainsi. »
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh do not value the lives of their fellow humans, and are therefore capable of sacrificing hundreds and thousands in a single battle. This is what their art of war — if you can call it that — is built upon."

traits.locale_text: « Les mon-keigh n'accordent aucune importance à la vie de leurs semblables et sont donc capables de sacrifier des milliers des leurs au cours d'une seule bataille. C'est sur cela que se base leur art de la guerre... si on peut appeler cela ainsi. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Los mon-keigh no valoran las vidas de los otros humanos y por eso pueden sacrificar a cientos y miles en una sola batalla. En eso se basa su arte, por llamarlo de alguna manera, de la guerra».
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh do not value the lives of their fellow humans, and are therefore capable of sacrificing hundreds and thousands in a single battle. This is what their art of war — if you can call it that — is built upon."

traits.locale_text: «Los mon-keigh no valoran las vidas de los otros humanos y por eso pueden sacrificar a cientos y miles en una sola batalla. En eso se basa su arte, por llamarlo de alguna manera, de la guerra».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイは仲間の人間の命に価値を見出さない、ゆえに一度の戦いで何百、何千の犠牲を出せる。これは戦争の技術…いわば…この考えが土台になっているということか」
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh do not value the lives of their fellow humans, and are therefore capable of sacrificing hundreds and thousands in a single battle. This is what their art of war — if you can call it that — is built upon."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイは仲間の人間の命に価値を見出さない、ゆえに一度の戦いで何百、何千の犠牲を出せる。これは戦争の技術…いわば…この考えが土台になっているということか」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Chem-Pan-Sey messen den Leben ihrer Mitmenschen keinen Wert bei. Sie sind daher in der Lage, in einer einzigen Schlacht hunderte und tausende zu opfern. Darauf basiert ihre Kunst des Krieges, wenn man das so nennen kann."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh do not value the lives of their fellow humans, and are therefore capable of sacrificing hundreds and thousands in a single battle. This is what their art of war — if you can call it that — is built upon."

traits.locale_text: "Chem-Pan-Sey messen den Leben ihrer Mitmenschen keinen Wert bei. Sie sind daher in der Lage, in einer einzigen Schlacht hunderte und tausende zu opfern. Darauf basiert ihre Kunst des Krieges, wenn man das so nennen kann."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh do not value the lives of their fellow humans, and are therefore capable of sacrificing hundreds and thousands in a single battle. This is what their art of war — if you can call it that — is built upon."

languages.text: "Mon-keighler, dost oldukları insanların hayatına değer vermez. Bu sebeple tek bir savaşta yüzlerce, hatta binlerce insanı feda edebilirler. Onların sözde savaş sanatı, bunun üzerine kuruludur."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh do not value the lives of their fellow humans, and are therefore capable of sacrificing hundreds and thousands in a single battle. This is what their art of war — if you can call it that — is built upon."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighler, dost oldukları insanların hayatına değer vermez. Bu sebeple tek bir savaşta yüzlerce ve hatta binlerce insanı kurban edebilirler. Onların sözde savaş sanatı, bunun üzerine kuruludur."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
